mapper.insert: insert into enterprise_user(`enterprise_id`, `user_id`, `create_time`,`update_time`) values(#{enterpriseId}, #{userId}, now(), now());
mapper.select: select eu.*, p.sgname as userSgname from enterprise_user eu left join user_profile p on eu.user_id=p.user_id where enterprise_id=#{enterpriseId} order by id desc

select eu.*, p.sgname as userSgname, d.id as departmentId, d.name as departmentName from enterprise_user eu left join user_profile p on eu.user_id=p.user_id left join department d on d.enterprise_id=eu.enterprise_id where enterprise_id=#{enterpriseId} order by id desc
